info.name: Hare Trigger
info.attribution:
Layout and design by LawDawg96. Released to the Public Domain under CC0.

Wood grain background by RyanPro available under the Pixabay license from https://pixabay.com/photos/trees-wood-yellow-wood-oak-1915247/.

Rabbit icon in the Public Domain at https://www.svgrepo.com/svg/15010/rabbit-hand-drawn-animal-head.

Library image text, rabbit, and movement marks created by ChatGPT 4o.  LawDawg96 added the game hexes and icons.
info.description: Get your bunnies out to their burrows. But better be quick about it. The player that takes over the most spaces wins.

info.helpText:
Players sit in seats. Press restart button to select a random player to begin. Set up board by dragging hex cards. Click to rotate the hexes. Move the entire board by clicking and dragging any blank area. 

Do not press the turn button until the board is completely set up. Once the turn button is pressed, the board pieces are locked into place.

Move each player's pile of tokens to desired place on a hex. To move a part of the pile, click the pile and enter the number of tokens to be moved. That part of the pile will be broken off into a separate pile which is then dragged to its place.

fields.text: Are you sure you want to reset the game?
